name: Fish (Snowyboi)
description:
Simple game about fishing. Can be played through install or in a browser at: https://gotm.io/snowyandmat/fish

Made for brackeys game jam 2020.2 Since the theme was "re-wind" we (SnowyBoi and ImmortalMat) chose to make a game where you catch(re-wind) fish. This is the first time both of us have ever submitted a game for a jam.

Tutorial: press the left mouse button
